MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL24 and LL26 postcode area of Betws Y Coed and Llanrwst, affecting properties in Llanrwst Road, High Street and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulty locating the cause of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.32PM on 31st October 2020
